data.lyric:
[ti:The Christmas Song]
[ar:Nat King Cole]
[al:Merry Christmas With Nat King Cole]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]The Christmas Song (Merry Christmas to You) - Nat King Cole
[00:14.84]Chestnuts roasting on an open fire
[00:21.39]
[00:22.26]Jack Frost nipping at your nose
[00:27.82]
[00:29.25]Yuletide carols being sung by a choir
[00:35.01]
[00:35.89]And folks dressed up like Eskimos
[00:40.86]
[00:41.64]Everybody knows a turkey and some mistletoe
[00:48.32]
[00:50.29]Help to make the season bright
[00:55.39]
[00:57.60]Tiny tots with their eyes all aglow
[01:03.15]We'll find it hard to sleep tonight
[01:09.09]
[01:09.93]They know that Santa's on his way
[01:15.99]
[01:16.98]He's loaded lots of toys and goodies on his sleigh
[01:23.77]And every mother's child is gonna spy
[01:29.99]
[01:30.59]To see if reindeer really know how to fly
[01:37.13]
[01:37.98]And so I'm offering this simple phrase
[01:45.22]
[01:46.37]To kids from one to many two
[01:51.52]
[01:53.20]Although It's been said
[01:55.56]
[01:56.44]Many times  many ways
[01:58.89]Merry Christmas to you
[02:05.54]
[02:34.17]And so I'm offering this simple phrase
[02:41.94]
[02:43.36]To kids from one to many two
[02:47.96]
[02:50.52]Although It's been said
[02:53.28]Many times  many ways
[02:56.17]Merry Christmas to you
data.trans:
[ti:The Christmas Song]
[ar:Nat King Cole]
[al:Merry Christmas With Nat King Cole]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有翻译作品的著作权
[00:14.84]在大火上烘烤栗子
[00:21.39]
[00:22.26]严寒咬着你的鼻子
[00:27.82]
[00:29.25]合唱团高唱着圣诞颂歌
[00:35.01]
[00:35.89]大家打扮得就像爱斯基摩人
[00:40.86]
[00:41.64]每个人都知道一只火鸡 一些槲寄生
[00:48.32]
[00:50.29]为这个季节增添色彩
[00:55.39]
[00:57.60]孩子们眼睛发红 
[01:03.15]我们会发现今夜难以入睡
[01:09.09]
[01:09.93]他们知道圣诞老人已经在路上
[01:15.99]
[01:16.98]他在他的雪橇上装大量的玩具和许多好吃的
[01:23.77]每个孩子准备去偷看
[01:29.99]
[01:30.59]去看驯鹿到底怎么飞
[01:37.13]
[01:37.98]所以请允许我说出这简单的话语
[01:45.22]
[01:46.37]给所有的孩子们
[01:51.52]
[01:53.20]也许已经说了很多次
[01:55.56]
[01:56.44]很多次
[01:58.89]祝你圣诞快乐
[02:05.54]
[02:34.17]所以请允许我说出这简单的话语
[02:41.94]
[02:43.36]给所有的孩子们
[02:47.96]
[02:50.52]也许已经说了很多次
[02:53.28]很多次
[02:56.17]祝你圣诞快乐
[03:07.94]
